PotatoTomahto.qol: inventory click behavior closer to tg

Arkatos.bugfix: Fixed an issue where you could duplicate the monarch's crown when summoning it.

CheffieGithub.bugfix: Learning a spell from the spell tree will override that spell if it is present to assure it stays.
Rituos will have it spells removed correctly and will not remove arcyne eye or prestidigitation.
The learn spell... spell should get properly removed when appropiate.
Removing all spells no longer will give a message for every single spell.

SarmentiCampbell.rscadd: Zizo's Cleric/Paladin will be able to create cursed water rather than blessed water, healing the undead rather than living being.

SarmentiCampbell.bugfix: Transact won't use kobolds as currency.
Bloodrage will now properly apply the status effect.

CheffieGithub.bugfix: Unfix learn spell removal to fix spell tree visual bug.

CheffieGithub.code_imp: Issue reports are now uploaded to github via bot and do not require users to use github directly, it is still preferable to use github if possible.

Arkatos.bugfix: Fixed an issue where actors menu was not opening

Arkatos.rscadd: Added ascendant effects for gods' interventions, which makes them stronger and more impactful when the relevant god is ascendant.
